name: UpdateWafExclusionFilter
description:
Updates a WAF exclusion filter by its identifier.

Use this tool to update a specific Web Application Firewall (WAF) exclusion filter using its ID. It returns the updated exclusion filter object upon a successful request.

parameters.name: waf_exclusion_filter_identifier
parameters.description: The unique identifier of the WAF exclusion filter to be updated.

value_schema.description: The identifier of the WAF exclusion filter.

parameters.name: exclusion_filter_update
parameters.description: A JSON object containing the WAF exclusion filter details to update, including attributes like description, enabled status, IP list, and matching criteria.

description.description: A description for the exclusion filter.

enabled.description: Indicates whether the exclusion filter is enabled.

ip_list.description: The client IP addresses matched by the exclusion filter (CIDR notation is supported).

on_match.description: The action taken when the exclusion filter matches. When set to `monitor`, security traces are emitted but the requests are not blocked. By default, security traces are not emitted and the requests are not blocked.

parameters.description: A list of parameters matched by the exclusion filter in the HTTP query string and HTTP request body. Nested parameters can be matched by joining fields with a dot character.

path_glob.description: The HTTP path glob expression matched by the exclusion filter.

rule_id.description: Target a single WAF rule based on its identifier.

category.description: The category of the targeted WAF rules.

type.description: The type of the targeted WAF rules.

tags.description: Target multiple WAF rules based on their tags.

rules_target.description: The WAF rules targeted by the exclusion filter.

scope.description: The services where the exclusion filter is deployed.

attributes.description: Attributes for updating a WAF exclusion filter.

type.description: Type of the resource. The value should always be `exclusion_filter`.

data.description: Object for updating a single WAF exclusion filter.
